Title: Knife threats and racial abuse all in a day's work, say bus drivers

Title: The Fed is expected to cut rates. And, Afghan CIA fighters feel abandoned by the U.S.
Description:

Title: Pay cuts, poaching, and pivoting: Inside Scale AI after Meta

Title: How long Britain could really fight for if war broke out tomorrow
